VersionMismatch: {0} Will be kicked in {1}s for version mismatch
Role.Crewmate.LongInfo: As an Crewmate, Complete all tasks or vote out all killers.
Role.Sheriff.LongInfo: The Sheriff can shoot the Impostors (according to the host settings, the Sheriff can also kill neutrals). If the Sheriff tries to kill a crewmate, the Sheriff will kill himself.
Role.Snitch.Info: Finish your tasks to find the Impostors
Role.Snitch.LongInfo: After the Snitch completes all tasks, they can see the Impostor's roles and have a arrow putting towards them. When the Snitch has only one task left, the Impostors will see a arrow pointing towards the Snitch.
Role.Medic.Info: Cast a shield onto a player
Role.Medic.LongInfo:
The Medic can place a shield on the target. The Medic can only give one shield for the whole game. Depending on the settings, the target's shield can or cannot deactivate when the Medic dies. The Medic can also see if someone is trying to break the target's shield.
Depending on the Host's settings, the Medic or the target can see if the player has a shield.
Role.Altruist.LongInfo: As the Altruist, you can sacrifice yourself to revive a dead body.
Role.Impostor.LongInfo: As an Impostor, you're able to kill and sabotage.
Role.Morphling.Info: Change your appearance to deceive others
Role.Morphling.LongInfo: As the Morphling, you're able to sample a player of your choice. when sampled temporarily change your appearance to that player for a set amount of time.
Role.Swooper.LongInfo: As the Swooper, you can vanish temporarily.
Role.Janitor.LongInfo: As the Janitor, you can remove evidence by removing a body. depending on setting after cleaning a body kill cooldown will be set to a fixed amount.
Role.Miner.LongInfo: As the Miner, you are able to dig up vents wherever you like, note that everyone can see and use these vents.
Role.Plaguebearer.LongInfo: As the Plaguebearer, you are able to infect other players, players can also get infected by interacting with already infected players. Once all alive players are infected the Plaguebearer will turn into the Pestillence!
Role.Pestillence.LongInfo: As the Pestillence, you can only be killed by getting voted out.
Role.Mole.LongInfo: As the Mole, you are able to dig a set amount vents wherever you like, note that only you can see and use these vents.
Role.Phantom.Info: Complete all tasks without being seen
Role.Phantom.LongInfo: As the Phantom, to win, complete all tasks without being clicked on by another player. The Phantom will become more visible the more they move.
Role.Jester.LongInfo: As the Jester, to win, get voted out. That simple.
Role.Opportunist.LongInfo: As the Opportunist, if alive the Opportunist will win with the winning team.
Role.Swift.LongInfo: As the Swift, gain a set amount of speed
Role.Giant.LongInfo: As the Giant, you become twice the size of a normal crewmate, with the downside of being slower and unable to move inside vents.
Role.ButtonBerry.LongInfo: As the Button Berry, you can call 1 meeting at any point in the game.
Role.NoiseMaker.LongInfo: As the Noise Maker, on death release a loud sound that will notify all players of your location.
Role.Bait.LongInfo: As the Bait, on death force the killer to report your body!
DisconnectReason.Error: {0} Was kicked due to an error!
DisconnectReason.Unknown: {0} Left the game due to unknown reason?
BetterSetting.Description.SystemSettings: Configure system/mod options related to the game.
BetterSetting.Description.CrewmateRoles: Customize roles and settings for the Crewmates, defining their tasks and abilities.
BetterSetting.Description.ImpostorRoles: Adjust the roles and features for Impostors, managing their unique abilities and kill mechanics.
BetterSetting.Description.NeutralRoles: Set up roles that fall outside of the traditional Crewmate and Imposter dynamics, such as third-party characters with unique objectives.
BetterSetting.Description.Addons: Control additional role modifiers and enhancements that can affect all.
Command.Helper.commands: commands---Get a list of all available commands
Command.Helper.dump: dump---Dump the entire log to the user's desktop
Command.Helper.whisper: whisper [id] [msg]---Privately send an message to a player---[player id] [text]
Command.Helper.whisper.trim: w [id] [msg]---Privately send an message to a player---[player id] [text]
Command.Helper.name: name [name]---Set player name - {2}---[text]
Command.Helper.kick: kick [id]---Kick a player from the game - {1}---[player id]
Command.Helper.ban: ban [id]---Ban a player from the game - {1}---[player id]
Command.Helper.removeplayer: removeplayer [identifier]---Remove player from local <color=#4f92ff>Anti-Cheat</color> data---[FriendCode, HashPuid]
Command.Helper.removeall: removeall---Remove all players from local <color=#4f92ff>Anti-Cheat</color> data
Command.DebugHelper.role: role [role]---Set your role for the next game - {1} - {3}
Command.DebugHelper.setrole: setrole [id] [role]---Set another players role for the next game - {1} & {3}
Command.DebugHelper.syncallnames: syncallnames---Sync all players names for better host - {1} & {3}
DataBaseConnect.InitFailure: Error while connecting to BAU API, please check your network connection and retry login!
DataBaseConnect.InitFailurePublic: Error while connecting to BAU API, this could be caused by your internet connection. And so user perks are not available, you may continue to play as usual without these.
